attributes.action: Remove the commenting section under online newspapers articles and posts.
attributes.additional_details: I want it to be encouraged that newspapers remove the comment section and only allow it to be shared. That way if people want to be hateful they are only hateful more publicly and others can see them for who they are. I want everyone protected from seeing these vile comments.
attributes.background: Everyday I see countless hateful, racist ,sexist and hurtful comments on newspaper articles where it is just not needed. Posting these articles causes a lot of horrid comments from hateful people. I want it so that individuals aren’t infected by the hate. Also so cowards can’t hide behind screens.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual publishers.
